conbody.p:
A search field is a text field with database look-up facilities. You have the choice to:
Add a magnifying glass icon next to it. Keying in full or partial text and then clicking the icon opens a new page that lets you search within the database.
Add auto-complete functionality: keying first characters automatically retrieves matching items in the database and displays the first hits in a drop-down list.
Combine the search and auto-complete features. Events and filter sets apply on both features. The following image shows what a search field looks like:
